data.comment: The whistle has gone to start the match.
Throw-in for Mazatlan at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Mazatlan in their own half.
Leon's Yairo Moreno is on target but unsuccessful.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon.
In the minute 9, Cesar Huerta (Mazatlan) has received a first yellow card.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 13, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leon capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Mazatlan's half?
In the minute 15, Mazatlan awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Mazatlan a goal kick.
Angel Mena of Leon smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 18, Mazatlan needs to be cautious. Leon have an attacking throw-in.
Luis Montes (Leon) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 20, Leon's Nicolas Sosa misses with an attempt on goal.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
Mazatlan pushes forward through Candido Ramirez, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 22, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
Free kick for Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 24, Fernando Navarro (Leon) gets a yellow card.
Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Leon.
Nicolas Sosa of Leon is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 32, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Yairo Moreno for Leon who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
It seems as if Yairo Moreno is unable to continue. Jean Meneses replaces him for the home team.
In the minute 35, Ball safe as Leon is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
In the minute 42, Nicolas Diaz is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Leon drives forward and Nicolas Sosa gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Leon drive forward but Nicolas Sosa is judged offside.
In the minute 45, Nicolas Diaz for Mazatlan is back on the field again.
Throw-in Leon.
Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the away team a throw-in.
Candido Ramirez for Mazatlan is whistled offside.
In the minute 45, Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second half has started at Estadio Leon.
Marcos Ignacio Ambriz (Leon) is making a second substitution, with Joel Campbell replacing Nicolas Sosa.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 48, Free kick Mazatlan.
Ball safe as Mazatlan is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Leon.
In the minute 52, Goal! Miguel Sansores gives Mazatlan a 0-1 lead in Leon.
Free kick for Leon in the half of Mazatlan.
Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for Leon at Estadio Leon.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Mazatlan drive upfield and Candido Ramirez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Leon defender.
In the minute 58, Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Leon.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 61, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards the home team a throw-in.
In Leon a free kick has been awarded the away team.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Mazatlan awarded a free kick in their own half.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 64, Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Mazatlan to take a throw-in in Leon territory.
Throw-in for Mazatlan in the half of Leon.
In the minute 66, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fernando Navarro (Leon) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Leon.
In the minute 68, Carlos Vargas is on a sub for Candido Ramirez for Mazatlan.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Mazatlan in their own half.
Francisco Palencia is making the team's second substitution at Estadio Leon with Mario Osuna replacing Luis Mendoza.
In the minute 70, Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon.
Corner awarded to Leon.
In the minute 72, Ball goes out of play for a Mazatlan goal kick.
Leon awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Miguel Sansores.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a Mazatlan throw-in in Leon's half.
In the minute 75, Miguel Sansores, who was grimacing earlier, has been substituted. Fernando Aristeguieta is the substitute for Mazatlan.
Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
In the minute 76, In Leon Mazatlan attack through Fernando Aristeguieta. The finish is off target, however.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo awards Leon a goal kick.
Throw-in for Leon in the half of Mazatlan.
In the minute 78, Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Throw-in for Leon close to the penalty box.
Roberto Meraz (Mazatlan) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 80, The away team replace Roberto Meraz with Aldo Rocha.
Leon have been awarded a corner by Erick Yair Miranda Galindo.
Mazatlan have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Leon awarded a free kick in their own half.
Can Leon capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Jean Meneses levels the score at 1-1.
In the minute 84, Can Mazatlan get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Leon's half?
Free kick Mazatlan.
Erick Yair Miranda Galindo signals a free kick to Leon in their own half.
In the minute 86, Goal kick for Mazatlan at Estadio Leon.
Corner awarded to Mazatlan.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
In the minute 88, Mazatlan's Jorge Antonio Padilla Leal has been booked in Leon.
At Estadio Leon, William Tesillo has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Leon to take a throw-in in Mazatlan territory.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Leon.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick for Leon in their own half.
Leon have been given a penalty at Estadio Leon...
The match has come to a close in Leon. The final score is 2-1.
Aldo Rocha is booked for the away team.
Goal! The home team take a 2-1 lead thanks to a penalty from Angel Mena.
